# Initialize the Earth Engine API.


# -------------------------------------------------------------------
# 1. Define the Region of Interest (ROI)
# -------------------------------------------------------------------
# Orange field, Citrosuco Lower side
roi1 = ee.Geometry.Polygon([
    [
        [-48.45903900257203, -21.74614544899956],
        [-48.45526929458733, -21.74575640015184],
        [-48.45817336592369, -21.749724648955794],
        [-48.45459912427894, -21.749231865850856],
        [-48.45903900257203, -21.74614544899956]  # closing point
    ]
])

# (Assuming roi1, roi2, roi3, roi4, roi5, roi6, roi7, golf1, golf2, etc.,

#  brancoPeres are defined elsewhere.)
rois = {

    'nearAraquaba1': nearAraquaba1,
    'nearAraquaba2': nearAraquaba2,
    'nearAraquaba3': nearAraquaba3,
